`` Not your problem , of_course , unless Johnston and the murderer are one_and_the_same '' . They discussed this possibility . However likely it was , Pauling said , he could n't limit himself to it . He had to look_for other prospects , other motives until more conclusive evidence pointing to Johnston came to
light . Madden , with his investigation centered_on the fraud , said that tomorrow he would go_to the_Bronx bank through which Mrs._Meeker 's checks to Johnston had cleared . Arthur_Williams had to be located , they agreed . He might have been in collusion with Johnston on the fraud ; he might be Mrs._Meeker 's murderer or have played some part in her death .
